name: "Acid Hands" McGillicutty
effect: When this ally is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.

name: "Fungus Face" McGillicutty
effect: When this ally is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.
Death hasn't robbed the Forsaken of the ability to understand what you say. They're just not likely to listen.

name: A Bird in Hand
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, put it into your hand.
"The Harpies communicate across the ridge using a series of signal fires. If we extinguish one, Marion is sure to come investigate." - Thisalee Crow

name: Alecia Hall
effect: When this ally enters play, she heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
"It appears I have arrived with time to spare."

name: Angry Dread
effect: When this weapon enters play, you may draw a card.
"So I'll get to beat someone over the head with this? I'm in!" - Parvink
attributes: • Class: Death Knight Paladin Rogue Shaman Warrior

name: Baeltor of the Undercity
effect: On your turn: (2), Flip Baeltor → Opposing allies have -1 ATK this turn.

name: Benethor Draigo
effect: In life he cooked meat for his brothers. In death he cooked his brothers for meat.

name: Blight Bringers
effect: Up to three target allies have -3 ATK this turn.
"Beware their claws - even the slightest touch can be debilitating!" - Vanira Raventhorne

name: Blood Chill
effect:
Attach to target hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero.

If damage is dealt this way, exhaust each opposing hero or ally with Protector.

name: Bloodbane's Fall
effect: Your hero has Assault 1.
This cloak of Orbaz Bloodbane imbues the wearer with his latent aggression.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight Druid Hunter Mage Paladin Priest Rogue Shaman Warlock Warrior

name: Blueleaf Tubers
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
"Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me."

name: Brothers in Death
effect:
On your turn: Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"Tear that keep asunder, death knight. Find Koltira!" - Thassarian

name: Citadel Enforcer's Claymore
effect: "Marrowgar had no idea the power that lay amongst the bones of his slain enemies." - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Dark Cleric Jocasta
effect: When this ally enters play, you may put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Death Coil
effect:
Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.

Ready a Ghoul you control.
Those who have shunned the Light are welcomed with open arms by the shadows.

name: Drandus the Deathcaller
effect:
Protector

Ghouls you control have Assault 2.
"Obey the word of your master, or I will return you to the grave myself."

name: Emelia Darkhand
effect:
Protector

This ally can't attack unless an opponent controls more allies than you.
"Our troubles lie abroad, where the armies of the Lich King dwell. That is where the true challenge awaits."

name: Entrenched
effect:
If you control an ally: Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself." - Kor the Immovable

name: Erytheis
effect: When this ally is destroyed, she deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
"My friends are dead. My family is dead. Even I am dead. What do I have left to fear?"

name: Frost Fever
effect:
Attach to target hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero.

Allies in attached hero's party lose and can't have Assault and Mend.
"Before you know it, your body will be entombed in frost, inside and out." - Krunkle Deadspark

name: Gargoyle
effect:
Unholy Talent

Ferocity

At the end of your turn, if this ally is undamaged, put him into his owner's hand.

name: Greathelm of the Scourge Champion
effect: When this armor is destroyed, you may put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand at the start of the next turn.
Bestowed by the Lich King on those who willingly spread the disease of undeath.

name: Horn of Winter
effect: Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.
"The last sound you'll hear before death grips your soul." - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Murphy Watson
effect: This ally has Assault 3 while an ally is in your graveyard.
"I will ignite a fiery inferno and burn everything to ash before I serve the Lich King again!"

name: Obliterate
effect: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally, or 4 if you control a Disease.
"My runeblade thirsts for your soul." - Randolphe Mortimer

name: Rantuko Grimtouch
effect: When this ally readies, he deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing ally.
"Your efforts are commendable, but your death is inevitable."

name: Reanimator's Hacker
effect: (2), Destroy this weapon → Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.
"When you are offered a second chance at life, you will do anything to seize it." - Erondra Frostmoon

name: Sanguine Presence
effect:
Ongoing: Your hero has Protector and +10 .

(1), → Ready your hero.
"Da elements will fear da face of death, just as all else do." - Zin'sul

name: The Essence of Enmity
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"The creatures you seek swarm over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north." - Brogg

name: The Key to Freedom
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
The small brass key looks simple enough.

name: Unholy Ground
effect: Ongoing: When a non-token ally you control is destroyed, put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"You had better double your efforts." - Haedis

name: Vala Carville
effect: "I've spent a lifetime studying, and now it's time to show you what I've learned."
